googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingNotesCombined: Voting before Election Day at an absentee polling place is also an accessible voting option. Contact your county clerk for the dates, location and times. Early Voting or Absentee in-Person voting is available at the absentee polling place in your county.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined: * Any registered Idaho voter may request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: Idaho voters must include their Idaho driver's license number or state ID number with their online voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Idaho voters must provide their Idaho driver's license number, state ID number, or the last four digits of their social security number with their voter registration application. Voters must also physically show a valid document with their name and address, such as their driver's license, bank statement, or utility bill.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
To register in Idaho you must:

  * be at least 18 years old by Election Day
  * be a citizen of the United States
  * have resided in Idaho and in the county for at least 30 days before Election Day
  * not be serving a sentence of imprisonment for a felony. Your voting rights are restored once you have completed your sentence, probation, and parole.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingInPersonInfoCombined:
Early voting and absentee in person voting options vary by county in Idaho.  Contact [your county clerk](https://idahovotes.gov/county-clerks/) for more information about how it works in your county.

* [Ada County early voting information](https://adacounty.id.gov/elections/early-voting/)
* [Bannock County early voting information](https://www.bannockcounty.us/elections/)
* [Bonneville County early voting information](https://www.co.bonneville.id.us/index.php/elections/early-voting)
* [Canyon County early voting information](https://www.canyonco.org/election-day-polling-locations-early-voting-locations/)
* [Cassia County early voting information](https://www.cassiacounty.org/EarlyVoting)
* [Twin Falls early voting information](https://twinfallscounty.org/election/)
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingByMailInfoCombined:
* Voting before Election Day at an absentee polling place is also an accessible voting option. Contact your county clerk for the dates, location and times. 
* Early Voting or Absentee in-Person voting is available at the absentee polling place in your county.
